channel.title: Graphics y Cooking
channel.description: Recent content on Graphics y Cooking

item.title: Kickoff
item.description: I figure it’s about time that I try to disseminate some of the information that I’ve hoarded through the years. Selfishly, I’ve found that documenting something forces me truly understand whatever I’m writing about. This weblog is split into two primary topics: Graphics Programming Home Cooking Why these two? Why not? I care about these two things, so why not share some information? Especially in the age of COVID-19 (when this blog was born), these topics intersect more than ever!
